official_title: A bill to establish a commission to review the facts and circumstances surrounding Guamanian losses caused by the occupation of Guam by Japanese Imperial Forces during World War II.
short_title: Commission on the Wartime Occupation of Guam Act

summary.text: Commission on the Wartime Occupation of Guam Act - Establishes the Commission to review the Wartime Occupation of Guam, which shall: (1) review the facts and circumstances surrounding the claims of Guamanians for losses resulting from the Japanese occupation of Guam during World War II; and (2) recommend appropriate remedies. Directs the Commission to report its findings and recommendations to Congress within 18 months of its first meeting. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Commission on the Wartime Occupation of Guam Act
A bill to establish a commission to review the facts and circumstances surrounding Guamanian losses caused by the occupation of Guam by Japanese Imperial Forces during World War II.
